comment.author: 87298822@N05
comment._content: Loco line used to transport cane...don't know if this is Antigua...could be. I'm told there were a few of them back when sugar and cotton were still being farmed.

comment.author: 88020690@N03
comment._content: Yes it is! The Museum is on a restoration drive to restore i think two of these, the third one is in really bad shape.
